name: Bow of Chronos
description:
Play as a wizard exploring a dungeon on your own, when suddenly you step on a pressure plate and the door behind you comes crashing down. You find yourself trapped in a single room with a puzzle to solve in order to escape. This puzzle unfortunately seems impossible for you, runes integral to the puzzle have since faded and are now rendered illegible.

But thankfully you possess a curious yet powerful spell that summons an arrow that allows you to travel through time, witnessing visions of moments long forgotten. Though voices in these visions have become scattered. You must piece the whole story together, there will lie the answers you need to complete this puzzle, and escape the dungeon.

This is game made for the Neophyte Studios Narrative Game Jam 2023.
